insert into front_user_info (user_name, user_pass, name, nick_name, user_type, user_role, user_role_names, user_auth_status, user_auth_remark, user_valid, user_imel, baidu_push_user_id, baidu_push_device_type, push_switch_bbs, introducer, user_mail, comp_ids, comp_names, last_login_comp_id, login_dt, reg_dt, user_remark, blocked_balance, available_balance, total_balance, user_reg_source) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRoleNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAuthStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAuthRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userImel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baiduPushUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baiduPushDeviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pushSwitchBbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginCompId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockedBalance,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{availableBalance,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{totalBalance,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userRegSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
